Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.gamesetting.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(Player player, Tower tower)
      Construct a new Board with a default of 4 Lanes
      Board(Player player, Tower tower, int numberOfLanes, int numberOfTiles)
      Construct a new Board with a given number of Lanes each lane will have the same number of Tiles.

      • Board

        public Board(Player player,
             Tower tower)
        Construct a new Board with a default of 4 Lanes
        Parameters:
        player - The current Player
        tower - The current Tower on the Board

      • Board

        public Board(Player player,
             Tower tower,
             int numberOfLanes,
             int numberOfTiles)
        Construct a new Board with a given number of Lanes each lane will have the same number of Tiles.
        Parameters:
        player - The current Player
        tower - The current Tower on the Board
        numberOfLanes - The number of Lanes for the Board to have
        numberOfTiles - The number of Lanes for the Board to have

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empty the board

      • place

        public void place(Unit unit,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        Place an actor at the given lane and tile. if there is already an actor at that tile placing should not happen.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to be placed
        x - The X co-ordinate the place the Unit
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Unit

      • getActorAt

        public Actor getActorAt(int laneNo,
                        int tileNo)
        Place an entity at the given lane and tile. if there is already an entity at that tile it will be lost.
        Parameters:
        laneNo - The index of the lane the entity is in
        tileNo - The index of the tile the entity is in
        Returns:
        The Actor at the specific lane and tile

      • render

        public void render(float delta)
        Render the Board.
        Parameters:
        delta - - The time in seconds since the last render.
